detectors.description:
_BlockProtocolToken.tokenSale(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#154-176) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-_price = _eth / sPrice (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#160)
	-_tkns = sChunk * _price (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#161)
detectors.markdown:
[_BlockProtocolToken.tokenSale(address)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#L154-L176) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[_price = _eth / sPrice](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#L160)
	-[_tkns = sChunk * _price](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#L161)

detectors.description:
_BlockProtocolToken.startAirdrop(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#185-191) should emit an event for: 
	- aSBlock = _aSBlock (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#186) 
	- aEBlock = _aEBlock (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#187) 
	- aAmt = _aAmt (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#188) 
	- aCap = _aCap (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#189)

_BlockProtocolToken.startSale(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#192-199) should emit an event for: 
	- sSBlock = _sSBlock (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#193) 
	- sEBlock = _sEBlock (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#194) 
	- sChunk = _sChunk (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#195) 
	- sPrice = _sPrice (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#196) 
	- sCap = _sCap (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#197)
solc-0.5.10 is not recommended for deployment

detectors.description: Variable TokenERC20._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#70) is not in mixedCase

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#23)
	- TokenERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#84-86)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#25)
	- TokenERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#108-110)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#26)
	- TokenERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#90-95)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#27)
	- TokenERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#96-100)

transferOwnership(address) should be declared external:
	- Owned.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#53-55)

acceptOwnership() should be declared external:
	- Owned.acceptOwnership() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/_BlockProtocolToken.sol#56-61)
